{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Maces & Flails]]' category. It is a one handed weapon, and it is better for the strong.}}

A '''spiked flail''' is the best common one-handed mace.  It requires a skill of 18 to reach min delay though; you can get better damage with the same delay at 14 skill if you use a [[dire flail]], although that is two-handed.  Don't enchant one of these, since [[demon whip]]s are common later on.
